name: frequency
signature: (name: string, options?: { readonly description?: string; readonly preregisteredWords?: readonly string[]; }) => Metric.Frequency<string>
description:
Creates a Frequency metric to count occurrences of events.
Frequency metrics are used to count the number of times specific events or incidents occur.
